Dear Mr• Lewis:
I regret to inform you that it was not possible for the Grants-
in-A id Sub-Committee of the NAEB Research Committee to approve
your application of December 289 19If7 for a grant-in-aid•
We wish there had been adequate funds to support all applications9
for your application did offer considerable promise« We hope you
may still he able to carry it on9 in whole or in part9 on funds
from your own or other sources*
Meamchile9 may we thank you for your application and wish you
every success•
